title: Chives The Profitable Short Season Crop #gardening  #financial #Farming #Agriculture #agribusiness

subtasks: Smell chives to confirm their scent
Understand chives' relation to onions, garlic, and leeks
Visualize chives' appearance (long thin leaves, hollow tubes)
Recognize chives as a profitable crop (maturing in 45 days, harvest every 25 days for 3 years)
Consider chives as an investment opportunity for gardeners
Determine the optimal planting time (answer: second best time is now, after 20 years ago)
Subscribe to learn more horticultural techniques (implied step in preparation for gardening)
